titleStmt.title: The Germane spie truly discovering the deplorable condition of the kingdom and subjects of the French king : being an abstract of the several years observations of a gentleman who made that the peculiar business of his travels : with a continuation of Christianismus Christianandus.

notesStmt.note: "A catalogue of French commodities yearly transported into England": p. 71-72.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
